artist: Manufacturer: Doulton Art Pottery; Decorator: Hannah B. Barlow
description: narrow base with flaring mouth and 3 subtile corners; tan interior; incised decoration of 3 wolves standing in front of grasses; metal rim
markings: \"DOULTON/LAMBETH\", \"1878\", \"199\", \"EHB\", \"C\", \"O\", with other stamps, on bottom; \"JENNER & KNEWSTUB 33 ST JAMES ST SW\" and other stamps, at rim
title: Vase
